short_description: Clusters data using a Gaussian Mixture Model.
long_description: Predicts cluster assignments using a Gaussian Mixture Model generated by GMMFit.

input_tables.name: testdata
input_tables.description: Contains the data whose cluster values are to be predicted. The column names for the data to be classified must be the same as the column names in modeldata.

input_tables.name: modeldata
input_tables.description: Contains a GMM model output by GMMFit.

argument_clauses.name: OutputFormat
argument_clauses.description: Specifies whether the output table will be in dense format or sparse format. In dense format, the weights that GMMPredict assigns to each of the top n clusters are all output to a single row. In sparse format, each weight is output to a separate row.  The permitted input values are [dense, sparse]. The default value is sparse.

argument_clauses.name: TopNClusters
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the number of cluster weights that GMMPredict should output. If TopNClusters is set to k, the function will output for each data point the cluster with the greatest weight, the cluster with the 2nd greatest weight, and so on up to the cluster with the kth greatest weight. The input value must be greater than 0. The default value is 1.

argument_clauses.name: PrintLogLikelihood
argument_clauses.description: If 'true', prints out the overall log likelihood of an observation given the data. The default value is false.
